messages.title: A Future Fair For All
messages.content: IT'S YOUR FUTURE. VOTE FOR IT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A promise to give a £200,000 tax cut to the richest 3,000 estates in Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's still only Labour who can beat the Tories in Stockton South. Nick Clegg is refusing to rule out backing the Tories in a hung parliament. In our area, a vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote that helps the Tories.

issues.economy: Labour enacted policies to support families and businesses and revive the economy during the global recession.
issues.education: Investing in our teachers, nurses and police.
issues.health: Investing in our teachers, nurses and police.
issues.socialWelfare: Proud of support provided to struggling families and individuals, including those who lost their jobs.

housing.content: The Tories abandoned Teesside under Thatcher. They closed down our industries, they employed and left Labour to pick up the pieces.

contactInformation.address: Beckfields Avenue, Ingleby Barwick, Stockton-on-Tees, TS17 0QA

images.caption: Dari Taylor, in a campaign photograph.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS Don't risk not voting Labour this election. If you need help getting to a polling station, call our campaign team on 01642 615778.
